results.title: Custom Horse Hat, Live Love Laugh Ride, Horse Lover Hat, Cowgirl Hat, Hat for Horse Girl, Woman's Horse Hat, Barn Hat, Horse Crazy Hat
results.description:
Fun, comfortable hat with "Live Love Laugh Ride" design for the horse lover, cowgirl, riding instructor, barn mom, etc.!  A relaxed fit, pigment-dyed hat, adjustable to fit most adults and older youth.  We create our own designs and make each hat to order just for you!

Hat Options:
*Choose from a variety of pigment-dyed hat colors.
*Choose the design color in flat white, flat black, or several glitter colors.
*(optional) We can also customize the hat with a name at no extra cost.  Please indicate name (15 max characters), and select your font from the included picture.  We can add the name to the right or left brim, or on the back around the opening. (Please see pictures for placement options.)  Personalization will be done in the same color as you have chosen for the hat design.

Hat Details:
*Design and optional customization are made with high quality, permanent heat transfer vinyl.
*100% cotton for great comfort and fit. 
*Relaxed crown with top button and six sewn eyelets. 
*6-panel, low-profile, adjustment strap with brass buckle.

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Repeat. Graphic Rose Skull Motif, Short-Sleeve Unisex T-Shirt
results.description:
Live, Love, Laugh Repeat. Graphic Rose Skull Motif, Words to live by with a Graphic Skull Motif. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. And the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite!  

• 100% ring-spun cotton
• Sport Grey is 90% ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester
• Dark Heather is 65% polyester, 35% cotton
• 4.5 oz/y² (153 g/m²)
• Pre-shrunk
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
• Quarter-turned to avoid crease down the center

results.description:
This unique Live Laugh Love art print is a perfect decoration for any room in the home.would also be a great wall art for live room and bed room.

*NO FRAME IS INCLUDED - PURCHASE IS FOR PRINT ONLY*

It is printed with archival Epson UltraChrome water based HDR pigment inks on a 192g archival matte paper that is heavyweight, cotton fiber and acid free.

We ship worldwide via USPS First Class Mail (Standard) or DHL Expedited post service (final delivery is completed by USPS). All prints are made-to-order and posted securely in a sturdy mailing tube within 3-5 business days. Tracking number included.

Note: We will deliver to the address associated with you Etsy account.

Your art print is printed on demand which means it is custom made especially for you. As a result we do not technically offer returns.

However if we make a mistake, we are more than happy to reprint and reship your order at our expense. You satisfaction is our top priority!

Please visit shop Policies and FAQ for more details, and of course feel free to contact me with any questions.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Art / Typography / Wall Decor / Home Decor / Custom / Art Prints
results.description:
Live every moment, laugh until it hurts, love like crazy...words this world could use a little more of! This fun art print is the perfect way to remind us to live life to the fullest and have fun! A neutral background and customizable colors insure that it will match any home decor and a variety of sizes enable you to fill a big or small area. This inspiring art print makes a unique gift and a great addition to any living room, bedroom, hallway, media room, basement, bathroom or entry way decor.

Printed with premium inks and archival paper insures your art print will last for years to come. Art print arrives unframed, allowing you to pick out the perfect frame.

To browse more family prints: https://etsy.me/3aBVYZc

To create a custom art print bundle: https://etsy.me/3oL0IAC

To return to my shop: https://etsy.me/2MkIjxy
------------------------------------------------------------

DETAILS

• Custom colors available

• Variety of sizes from 5x7 to 12x16

• Printed with premium inks

• Premium archival paper choice of luster photo paper or velvet textured matte fine art paper

• Art print ONLY.  **FRAME AND MAT NOT INCLUDED**

Please note: item colors may vary slightly from listing due to specific color calibrations on your computer monitor.
------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO CUSTOMIZE

• Review color palette (see last photo) and list your custom color choices in the Notes to Seller section at checkout.

• I will message you through Etsy if I have any questions. I can’t proceed until I have all the correct information.

• I will send you a PDF art proof for approval through Etsy message within 2-3 business days. Please reply to the message as I will won't print until I have received approval.

Don't see the color that you want? Please ask me! I will do my best to accommodate you!
------------------------------------------------------------

© pint-sized Bee Design Studio - All rights reserved. May not be reproduced, duplicated, or resold.
------------------------------------------------------------

If you have any questions, please contact me. 
------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for shopping! Have a great day!

results.title: Original and Unique Irish Blessing Coffee Mug! Sturdy, generous and unique! Perfect for the office , school or everyday use at home!
results.description:
This warm and inspirational Irish Blessing wraps virtually around the entire mug. Incorporating Gaelic motifs including  Irish knot work,Celtic script ,Gaelic headlines Gra,(love) Saol, (live) and Gaire, (laugh) This lovely blessing is a perfect year long reminder of the warm and jovial spirit of St Patrick's day ! It certainly stands out as a perfect housewarming or  birthday gift as well.

The Blessing reads:
May love and laughter light your days 
And warm your heart and home
May good and faithful friends be yours 
Wherever you may roam

After the design and writing stages are complete the blessing is heat transferred onto the generous sized mug and left to cure.

We certainly hope that this mug will bring both the perfect brew to your lips and a very ready smile to your face!

Cheers!

results.title: Live Laugh Love | Sublimation Transfer
results.description:
This is a sublimation transfer and you must have a heat press to apply.

Application Recommendations:

Set heat temperature to 385 degrees Fahrenheit.
Place shirt on heat press.
I recommend putting a piece of Kraft paper in the middle of the shirt to avoid bleeding.
It is also recommended to use a shirt that is 100% polyester, however you can use a 65% polyester shirt but the color will not be as vibrant and may fade.
The fabric should be white or light colored.
Place transfer face down on the shirt.
Press for 60-85 seconds at low-medium pressure. {This is dependent on material}
Remove paper and transfer immediately.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

Color may vary due to screen resolutions and displays.

All measurements are approximate and will be sized according to the design.

NO DIGITAL FILE INCLUDED
TRANSFER ONLY - NO GARMENTS INCLUDED

results.description: Live Love Laugh woodburned box with lid. ( Not a hinges box) for storing Jewelry or other souvenirs. 23.5 cm length x 15cm wide x 5 cm high. (9x6x2 inches). 0.5cm smaller inside to allow for wood thickness.

results.title: Life Love Live Laugh Script Word Cut Out - Laser Cut Words from Wood
results.description:
Life Love Live Laugh Script Word Cut Out - Laser Cut Words from Wood

Perfect for weddings or wall decoration.

Buying Options:
Please select the desired width in drop down.  Final sizes are:


8" width x 8" height 
10" width x 10" height
12" width x 12" height

How it works:
We use a laser cutting system to precisely cut out the shapes you see in the sample pictures.  The edge of the material will have a nice golden brown crisp color to it.  It uses insane heat, aka FIRE, to cut the material.  You'll have a very light amount of charring, but it looks cool.  And it's also easy to cover with paint.

Notes:
1) Items are unpainted, 1/4" birch or maple plywood
2) Items are cut with a laser, and will have brown, burnt edges
3) Photos shown are mock-up images of what the final part will look like.  We use the exact cut file to generate the real part.
4) Small, Family Owned Ohio Business.... and We ship fast!

results.title: Live laugh love necklace, Sterling silver bar necklace, Vertical bar necklace made to order, Inspiration necklace
results.description:
This Live Laugh Love sterling silver bar necklace is handcrafted from a sterling silver 1 mm thick sheet. An inspirational necklace which is also a great reminder for whom ever wears it.

You can wear this necklace alone or with other necklaces at different length.
It is simple, chic and sexy, a lovely gift for a friend, or for yourself.

The bar is hand engraved by me, so each one will be slightly different and one of a kind.

Bar dimensions – approx 0.27" wide X 1.77" long (7mm wide X 45mm long)
Necklace length is approx 16” (42 cm), but I can make it longer upon request.

If you want your own special inspirational sentence, let me know and I will gladly custom craft your necklace for you:
I offer 3 sizes of pendants:
1.18 inches (3 cm) long pendant – 39$ (for very short sentences)
1.57 inches (4 cm) long pendant – 44$
1.96 inches (5 cm) long pendant – 49$

The bar has a shinny finish but I can also make it matte and/or oxidized, as per request. If not stated other finish - you will have your bar with a shinny finish.

This bar necklace is handmade by me, please allow few days to craft your order. I'll do my best to ship it sooner.

* The last photo showing the necklace on a model - The length of the bar is 1.18 inches. The bar in this listing is 1.77" long.

For more necklaces from my shop:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/SigalFJewelry?ref=hdr_shop_menu§ion_id=10210781

Please read shop’s policies for shipping times & costs: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/SigalFJewelry?ref=l2-shopheader-name#policies

results.title: Breast Cancer T-Shirt | Love Laugh Fight Live | Distressed American Flag Heart Pink Awareness Ribbon | Sizes S M L XL 2XL 3XL 4XL 5XL Tee
results.description:
Delayed Shipping Info: All of my products are made to order using artwork I have designed and then sent to one my printing partners who prints and, in some cases, cuts and sews the products. My printing partner is still operating and I'm continuing to accept orders. Due to high demand and shipping delays beyond my control, fulfillment and shipping may take longer but your order will reach you. I cannot guarantee any shipping timeframes but please be assured that we are all doing our best to get your product to you in a timely manner to the best of our ability. These custom made to order products are usually printed and sewn in the printing facility closest to your shipping address however, in some cases, your order may be rerouted to one of the other locations if doing so is necessary for faster fulfillment due to supply chain delays, mandated restrictions, or other issues. Your support means a lot to us, especially during this time. Stay safe and take care of yourselves.

Refunds and Returns Info: This item is made to order therefore there are no refunds or returns due to ordering wrong size or buyer remorse. Please be sure to order the correct size and be aware of possible delayed shipping. Size is listed in description so be sure to measure before you order. If your item is defective, has printing errors, or wrong item is received then you will be sent a replacement of the same item you ordered. You will be asked to send in a picture to prove the problem and/or may be required to return the item before a replacement is issued. Refunds will not be issued.

***Please Note: Screen colors and design placement may differ slightly from actual printed product due to this being a custom made product. Size Variance +/- 1"-2". I reserve the right to send an alternative shirt brand and/or style or use a different printing company should the need arise due to out of stock products or other availability issues in order to reduce order delays.***
